resources.string:
Node Bot Dashboard v%1$s

This app is designed for managing Discord bots with an integrated terminal and runtime tools.

Main features:
- In-app terminal interface
- Add JavaScript/Python bot profiles
- Bot dashboard with startup/modules/network/explorer sections
- Embedded Node runtime bootstrap for internal local service tasks
- Configurable settings for bot operators

Use this app to organize scripts, inspect status, and quickly operate your bot workflows from Android.
